entry.tran: 独自地;单独地;无人帮助地;单枪匹马地
entry.def: If you do something single-handed, you do it on your own, without help from anyone else.

example.ex: I brought up my seven children single-handed...
example.tran: 我独自一人抚养了 7 个孩子。

example.tran: 她几乎是一手改变了英国政治的面貌。
